 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַעְדֵּר‎</span> **noun [masculine]** ==hoe== [[Isa.7.25|Isa 7:25]], see foregoing. 

 <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מָרֵא‎</span> **noun masculine** ==lord== ([[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מָר‎</span>, with <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מָרֵי‎</span>; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, e. <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Egyptian Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מרא‎</span> (RÉS<sup>i. 361</sup>); Christian-Palestinian Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, etc., [[BDB#Schulth|Schulth]]<sup>Lex. 115</sup>; Old Aramaic Nabataean Palmyrene <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מר(אׅ‎</span> ([[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>316</sup>); compare proper name, of deity <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מרנא‎</span> (<span class="bdbLangGreek">μαρνα</span>), god of Gaza, [[BDB#Cook|SAC]]<sup>77</sup>; also Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***man***, Sabean <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מרא‎</span>, ***man, lord*** [[BDB#Hom|Hom]]<sup>Chr 127; AA 293</sup> RÉS:i. 454, 2); — ***lord:*** of God, construct <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שְׁמַיָּא‎</span> [[Dan.5.23|Dan 5:23]], <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מָרֵה מַלְכִין‎</span> [[Dan.2.47|Dan 2:47]] of king, suffix <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מָֽרְאִי‎</span> [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] (as Nabataean, [[BDB#Cook|SAC]]<sup>l.c</sup>.; [[BDB#Kau|K]]<sup>§ 58, 1</sup>), [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מָרִי‎</span> (as Palmyrene, [[BDB#Cook|SAC]]<sup>l.c</sup>.) [[Dan.4.16|Dan 4:16]]; [[Dan.4.21|Dan 4:21]].
